name: ItemTemplate
summary: Template that represents the basic appearance of a list item.

properties.name: childTemplates
properties.summary: Contains an array of subview templates to be added (in order) as children to this view.

properties.name: events
properties.summary: Contains key-value pairs of view events and their listeners that are applied to the ListItem.
properties.description:
Array values are considered as multiple event listeners for that event.

Event listeners added here respond to bubbled events fired from the view subcomponents.

properties.name: properties
properties.summary: Contains key-value pairs of view properties and their values that are applied to the ListItem.
properties.description: If there are properties set in the ListDataItem, the properties set in the template are overridden by the ones set in the list data item.
